key_features: Get up to 10% bonus cashback on 3 bonus categories: Smart Dining, Smart Streaming and Smart Transport
Smart Dining merchants: McDonald's, KFC, Burger King, Ya Kun Kaya Toast, Toast Box, Starbucks, The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf, and many more!
Smart Streaming merchants: Netflix, Spotify, YouTube, Disney+, Amazon Prime, Viu, iQiyi, HBO GO
Smart Transport: Bus & MRT commute via SimplyGo, Electric Vehicle Charging
Enjoy 1% cashback on all other eligible spends (for card spend above S$1,500)
Enjoy SmartDelay - complimentary access to selected airport lounges worldwide in event of flight delay (effective 15 Jan 2025 onwards)

At MoneySmart, we strive to keep our information accurate and up to date. This information may be different from what you see when you visit a financial institution, service provider, or specific product site. MoneySmart shall not be liable to compensate the Customer should the information is not as updated as our Partner.
petrol: Up to 23.4% fuel savings at Caltex with your Smart Credit card
cash_back: Earn 10% bonus cashback when you spend a min. of S$1,500 on the 3 Bonus Categories
Earn 8% bonus cashback when you spend a min. of S$800 to S$1,499 on the 3 Bonus Categories
Earn 4% bonus cashback* when you spend a less than S$800 on the 3 Bonus Categories (*valid from 6 Dec 2024 to 31 March 2025)
Earn 8% bonus cashback when you spend a min. of S$800 to S$1,499 on the 3 Bonus Categories
Bonus Categories include Smart Dining, Smart Streaming and Smart Transport

fees.annual_fee_waiver: Annual Fee waived if your annual spend is above S$10,000
fees.minimum_monthly_repayment: S$50 OR 1% of principal / interest, fees & charges / overlimit amount / past due amount, whichever is higher
